title: Energy crystal
description: The energy crystal was a power source used by the InterGalactic Banking Clan to power their energy collector core stationed on Mygeeto to power the nearby droid factories. During the Battle of Mygeeto, a detachment of the 501st Legion led by General Ki-Adi-Mundi extracted the crystal from the core. The mission was, in truth, an operation guided by Palpatine known as "Hammertong." The crystal would later be used by Imperial engineers as the energy source for the superlaser of the Galactic Empire'
cleaned_text: The energy crystal was a power source used by the [InterGalactic Banking Clan](/wiki/InterGalactic_Banking_Clan/Legends) to power their [energy collector core](/wiki/Energy_collector_core) stationed on [Mygeeto](/wiki/Mygeeto/Legends) to power the nearby droid factories. During the [Battle of Mygeeto](/wiki/Battle_of_Mygeeto), a detachment of the [501st Legion](/wiki/501st_Legion/Legends) led by [General](/wiki/General/Legends) [Ki-Adi-Mundi](/wiki/Ki-Adi-Mundi/Legends) extracted the crystal from the core. The mission was, in truth, an operation guided by [Palpatine](/wiki/Palpatine/Legends) known as " [Hammertong](/wiki/Hammertong/Legends)." The crystal would later be used by [Imperial](/wiki/Galactic_Empire/Legends) engineers as the energy source for the superlaser of the [Galactic Complete Star Wars Encyclopedia](/wiki/The_Complete_Star_Wars_Encyclopedia)(Mentioned in multiple entries, but without own entry) [Star Wars: The Official Starships & Vehicles Collection
